item.title: The Blind - Duck Dynasty’s Phil Robertson & His Journey to Faith w/ Producer Zach Dasher [CrossPolitic Show]
item.description:
Host & Support ‘The Blind’ near you! 

https://theblindmovie.com/ 

 

Oklahoma Hymn Sing:

The Cumings family is hosting a hymn sing Sunday, October 1, from 5-8pm. Join them if you are passionate about worshiping God in music or just want to sing traditional hymns in an informal setting.  Email Christopher at christopherandmary@gmail.com for their address west of Tulsa, Oklahoma. They have a few extra 1961 Trinity hymnals, so if you have some hymnals, bring them. Mary will have a baked potato bar, dessert, and coffee. You are not required to bring food, but you may bring potato toppings or dessert if you would like to do so. Bring lawn chairs in case we run out of room inside. Again, email christopherandmary@gmail.com for their address for the hymn sing happening October 1st - from 5-8pm. 

 

Sign up for the FLF Conference at the Ark Encounter! (Oct 11-14)

https://flfnetwork.com/the-politics-of-six-days-creation-conference/ 

 

Support Us & Sign up for a FLF Club Membership! 

https://flfnetwork.com/product/fightlaughfestclub/?attribute_member-tier=silver-monthly
